headline.main: Starbucks US Sales Jump Over Holidays; Outlook Disappoints
headline.print_headline: Starbucks US Sales Jump Over Holidays; Outlook Disappoints

docs.snippet: An alleged war on Christmas by Starbucks apparently didn't dampen the chain's holiday sales, but its outlook going forward fell short of Wall Street expectations....
docs.lead_paragraph: An alleged war on Christmas by Starbucks apparently didn't dampen the chain's holiday sales, but its outlook going forward fell short of Wall Street expectations.

headline.main: Boeing to Cut 747-8 Production in Half as Demand Slows
headline.print_headline: Boeing to Cut 747-8 Production in Half as Demand Slows

docs.snippet: Boeing Co said on Thursday it will cut production of its 747-8 jumbo jet in half and take a $569 million charge in the fourth quarter as it faces dwindling sales....
docs.lead_paragraph: Boeing Co said on Thursday it will cut production of its 747-8 jumbo jet in half and take a $569 million charge in the fourth quarter as it faces dwindling sales.

headline.main: SAT Tests Canceled in China, Macau Over Cheating Concerns
headline.print_headline: SAT Tests Canceled in China, Macau Over Cheating Concerns

docs.snippet: The firm that oversees registrations for the SAT has canceled college entrance exams on Saturday in China and Macau, because some students may have already seen copies of the tests....
docs.lead_paragraph: The firm that oversees registrations for the SAT has canceled college entrance exams on Saturday in China and Macau, because some students may have already seen copies of the tests.

headline.main: Cheaper Fuel Boosts 4Q Profit at United, Southwest
headline.print_headline: Cheaper Fuel Boosts 4Q Profit at United, Southwest

docs.snippet: Lower fuel prices are boosting airline profits and leaving enough left over for passengers to get slightly lower fares....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lower fuel prices are boosting airline profits and leaving enough left over for passengers to get slightly lower fares.

headline.main: EPA Actions in Flint Water Crisis to Be Examined: White House
headline.print_headline: EPA Actions in Flint Water Crisis to Be Examined: White House

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama will ensure that federal officials are held accountable if any wrongdoing is uncovered in the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's handling of the water contamination crisis in Flint, Michigan, the White House said on Thur...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama will ensure that federal officials are held accountable if any wrongdoing is uncovered in the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's handling of the water contamination crisis in Flint, Michigan, the White House said on Thursday.

headline.main: New York City Mayor Presents $82 Billion Budget, Warns of Challenges
headline.print_headline: New York City Mayor Presents $82 Billion Budget, Warns of Challenges

docs.snippet: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio presented an $82.1 billion preliminary budget for the city's 2016-17 financial year on Thursday, noting the city's strong economic position but striking a cautionary note over the economic outlook....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio presented an $82.1 billion preliminary budget for the city's 2016-17 financial year on Thursday, noting the city's strong economic position but striking a cautionary note over the economic outlook.
